text:
Curoverse (a Veritas Genetics company) | Boston, MA or REMOTE | https://curoverse.com/about

Veritas Genetics is at the cutting edge of direct to consumer whole genome sequencing. Come work on the open source Arvados (https://arvados.org/) platform for cloud-based management of petabytes of genomic data and bioinformatics workflows. Our key technologies include Go, Python, Ruby, TypeScript, Common Workflow Language (CWL), Docker. No biology background needed.
